title: For Better or For Worse
description: Natasha BensonInvites you, the reader to follow her journey of marrying the man of her dreams:- he loves her; protects her; makes her laugh and she wants him to be her forever …….Until they actually get married!Natasha – “My life was so perfect, so structured and then it all came tumbling down in the worst way possible”Who knew that my weddingvows would become thestory of my life?This is my story, about how the perfect love can go horribly wrong. Follow me as I go through the big highs and great lows in my happy ever after.Coming April 2014For Better or For WorseBook 1 in Til Death Us Do Part Series
author: Krissy V.
